product_name: BENEFIT The POREfessional: Hydrate Primer
description: Defeat pores AND dryness! This silky-smooth, hydrating face primer instantly moisturises & refreshes skin, helps makeup stay put and minimises the look of pores and fine lines. It has the same oil-free, lightweight feel & pore-minimising power as the original The POREfessional PLUS 12-hour* hydration. Pores and dryness don’t stand a chance!

product_name: Benefit Porefessional Matte Rescue Primer
description: Matte rescue instantly minimises pore appearance. The lightweight, water-based gel overpowers shine and absorbs excess surface oil, leaving a natural-looking matte finish. Skin feels smooth and refreshed. Contains diamond powder known for its soft-focus pore-blurring effect.

product_name: Benefit The Porefessional License To Blot Instant
description: This instant oil-blotting stick with tiny invisible blotting spheres mattifies shine for up to six hours after application.* The specially designed triangular tip targets shiny zones: the sides of your nose, forehead and chin. Oil has finally met its matte!

product_name: Benefit That Gal" Brightening Face Primer
description:
Our silky pink primer takes your complexion from dull to darling! Simply blend it on for the look of brighter, smoother skin. Soothing raspberry & camomile
 Light-reflecting pigments
 Flatters all skintones

product_name: Benefit Benefit stay flawless 15 hour primer
description: Our instant PRO-long primer acts like a magnet to lock on your foundation for 15 fresh & flawless hours. This invisible stick primer glides directly onto skin for optimal wear & a natural-looking finish. Go longer. Stay flawless!

product_name: Benefit Roller Liner Liquid Eyeliner true matte
description: Glide on a natural-looking, fine line with Roller Liner! Our matte liquid eyeliner features a precision felt tip for sharp controlled lines and a super-smooth application that won’t drag or jag. The quick-dry, waterproof* formula lasts 24-hours**. It doesn’t fade, flake or smudge so you can let the good times roll all day & night!

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Rose Tinted Cheek And L
description: Our original rose-tinted stain is kiss-proof, see-through color for lips & cheeks that lasts for hours. Originally created for an exotic dancer in the 1970s, benetint has soared to cult fave status. It's loved by celebs, makeup artists and gals around the world.

product_name: Benefit Posietint Poppy-Pink Tinted Lip and Cheek
description: This poppy-pink tinted stain brightens lips & cheeks with a cheery pop of color. Our NEW! doe foot applicator glides right on lips for a pretty pink pout and blends beautifully onto cheeks for just-picked perfection on all complexions that lasts for hours.

product_name: Benefit Gogo Tint Lip and Cheek Satin
description: Turn on the cheekiness with this bright cherry red tinted lip & cheek stain! Our precise lip applicator glides right on lips for a juicy burst of colour and blends beautifully onto cheeks for a sweet, vibrant flush that lasts for hours.

product_name: BENEFIT COSMETICS Blush Bar Cheek Palette
description: This bronzer and blush palette is “tutu” cheeky! Our limited-edition cheek palette features NEW Gold Rush warm, golden-nectar blush, iconic Hoola matte bronzer, bestselling Dandelion baby-pink powder and MORE. With five shades to flatter all skintones, this full-size palette comes with a soft powder brush and our signature Tips & Tricks!

product_name: GALIFORNIA PINK BLUSHER
description: Benefit’s NEW GALifornia golden pink blush is part sun, pure fun! It blends bright pink with shimmering gold, for a sunkissed glow that complements all skintones. The soft, blendable formula captures the warmth of California sunshine, while the signature scent features notes of pink grapefruit & vanilla.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics They’re Real! Double The Lip Lip
description: Get fuller-looking lips in one easy stroke with they’re real! double the lip. This lip liner & lipstick in one features a Custom Teardrop Tip that grabs and defines your lip line and fills in lips with complementing color for the appearance of volume and dimension. This satin finish lipstick comes in neutral to bright shades for visibly fuller, sexier lips.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics They’re Real! Double The Lip Lip
description: Get fuller-looking lips in one easy stroke with they’re real! double the lip. This lip liner & lipstick in one features a Custom Teardrop Tip that grabs and defines your lip line and fills in lips with complementing color for the appearance of volume and dimension. This satin finish lipstick comes in neutral to bright shades for visibly fuller, sexier lips.

product_name: Cookie Powder Highlighter
description: A gorgeous glow is just a sweep away! Stroke our NEW, silky-fine powder highlighter along cheekbones for a delicious soft-gold shimmer. Includes a built-in mirror and powder brush for easy, seamless application.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Tickle Powder Highlighter
description: A gorgeous glow is just a sweep away! Stroke our NEW, silky-fine powder highlighter along cheekbones for a delicious soft-gold shimmer. Includes a built-in mirror and powder brush for easy, seamless application.

product_name: High Beam Liquid Face Highlighter
description: Our satiny pink liquid highlighter accents cheek & brow bones for a dewy glow. Our NEW! doe foot applicator glides on easily for a soft rose-gold radiance instantly! Use as a spot highlighter over makeup or wear under your complexion faves for subtle luminescence.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Watt's Up! Soft Focus Cream High
description: Our soft focus highlighter turns on “watt” ya got with a delicate rose-gold glow that’s gorgeous. The cream-to-powder finish is a switch-on “wow” for all complexions. You’ll adore the smooth applicator.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Girl Meets Pearl
description: This soft, liquid pearl luminizer features light-reflecting pigments to give your complexion an exquisite, dewy glow. It includes raspberry & chamomile, known for their soothing properties and sweet almond seed extract known to help improve skin firmness & smoothness.

product_name: Benefit Precisely My Brow Pencil Ultra Fine Brow D
description: Oh my WOW...precise & defined eyebrows! This ultra-fine eyebrow pencil draws incredibly natural-looking, hair-like strokes that last 12 budge-proof hours.* A few strokes of the rich yet blendable colour will transform brows from shapeless & undefined to filled & defined eyebrows. Includes signature Tips & Tricks.

description: This water-based, oil-free formula delivers undetectable coverage and a fresh, hydrated glow for the most natural skin-like finish. In addition to weightless, long-wearing coverage and hydration, the formula minimizes the appearance of pores, conceals imperfections, and delivers broad spectrum UV protection. Buildable formula goes easily from light to medium and is available in wide range of shades for all skin tones

product_name: Bobbi Brown Skin Long-Wear Fluid Powder Foundation
description:
Our first-ever liquid-to-powder foundation that self-sets into a comfortable, soft-matte finish. Formulated with a Power Protein Complex to help skin look smooth and healthy, this lightweight, sweat-resistant formula controls oil and stays color true all day. Plus, it keeps skin protected on the go with environmental, blue light and UV filters.
 
 Ideal for oily skin types.
 
 Paraben-free; phthalate-free; sulfite-free; gluten-free

product_name: DIORSKIN FOREVER FLUIDE
description:
With Dior Forever and its iconic long-wearing foundation formula, the complexion appears flawless and even and the pores tightened, from morning to night. This enveloping fluid foundation does not just instantly embellish the skin: it improves its beauty day after day with a formula enriched in meticulously selected skincare ingredients to reveal the skin's full sensuality. 
 
 Dior Forever provides the skin with a velvety matte finish. Dior Forever is also available in Dior Forever Skin Glow fo

product_name: DIORSKIN NUDE AIR LOOSE POWDER
description:
The ultimate finishing touch, impressively lightweight Diorskin Nude Air loose and compact powders maintain the illusion of a fresh and radiant face. 
 
 Airy and non-occlusive, they let the skin breathe freely and form a genuine "pollution-fighting" shield that limits the absorption of harmful particles. The skin preserves its natural beauty with each new application.

product_name: POWDER EYEBROW PENCIL
description:
The finish of a powder combined with the powerful definition of a wax in a professional pencil that gives a denser shape to the brow line for a naturally structured effect.
 
 Decked out in a new cloak of midnight blue, the range is now available in six shades, including two new ash shades suited to blonde or light brown tones.

product_name: DIORSHOW
description:
In 2015, Diorshow, the professional Dior Backstage mascara, is being renewed. Its new-generation formula enriched with microfibres optically reproduces the effect of lash extensions used by runway makeup artists. 
 
 Its patented AIR-LOCK™ wiper prevents the formula from being in contact with the air, keeping the mascara from drying in the tube, for fresh application, day after day.

product_name: DIORSHOW WATERPROOF
description:
The runway mascara with "lash-extension" volume, in a Waterproof version. 
 
 Diorshow teams the legendary power of its XXL brush with an incredibly buildable cream formula for adjustable professional volume that is nothing short of spectacular. 
 
 The result: custom volume that mirrors the effect of professional lash extensions used Backstage.

product_name: DIORSHOW PUMP N VOLUME
description: Dior reinvents volume with Diorshow Pump 'N' Volume, a brand new mascara by the House, for a fringe of XXL lashes. Spectacular from every angle, this new Dior mascara revolutionizes volume-building application. Simply squeeze the flexible mascara tube to soften the ultra-volumizing formula and load the brush with the creamy product. Achieve extreme volume instantly!

product_name: DIORSHOW PUMP N VOLUME WTP
description: In 2017, Dior revolutionized mascara with Diorshow Pump’N’Volume, a spectacular formula for extreme lash volume. This year, Dior is taking it a step further and releasing the squeezable effect in a waterpoof version for those who aren't afraid to play with colours and effects.

product_name: DIORSHOW BLACKOUT
description: Like kohl for the lashes. Diorshow Black Out recreates the captivating effect of kohl in a mascara for extreme volume with a charcoal-like finish.

product_name: DIORSHOW ICONIC
description:
The first lash-lifting mascara by Dior.
 
 Enriched with a unique lifting formula, Diorshow Iconic perfectly sculpts, stretches and curls lashes with impeccable hold and exceptional definition.

product_name: DIORSHOW ICONIC OVERCURL
description:
Diorshow Iconic Overcurl pushes the limits of curl to the extreme. 
 
 Its incurved brush delivers exceptional curling power for instant lash-styling along the entire fringe.

product_name: FENTY BEAUTY BY Rihanna Gloss Bomb Universal Lip L
description: This universal lip luminizer delivers explosive shine in three shades that flatter all skin tones. One swipe of Gloss Bomb’s XXL wand leaves lips looking instantly fuller and smoother. The non-sticky formula is super shiny, and has an addictive peach-vanilla scent you just can't get enough of. Rihanna was obsessed with creating the perfect gloss that makes you want to put it on over and over again.

product_name: Huda Beauty Power Bullet Matte Lipstick
description: Huda Beauty’s Matte Power Bullet combines unrivalled pigmentation with unexpected comfort that was designed to flatter every skin tone. With hyper-pigmentation at the core of its development, each shade was created with a custom formula that delivers consistent, full-coverage application. Our plush matte formula allows the colour to glide on easily, without skipping or dragging, and leaves lips feeling hydrated and smooth.

description:

 • Extreme Volume: This new mascara provides extreme volume, from root to tip. The eyelashes look amplified fom corner to corner. Create colume in a few easy strokes.

product_name: GRANDIOSE
description:
GRANDIÔSE LASH TRANSFORMATION: FANNED-OUT LASHES, DIVINE CURVES.
 Lancôme reinvents its mascara and unveils a new application technique that effortlessly creates perfectly open, full and even lashes. For the 1st time in Lancôme history, this patent-pending “Swan-NeckTM” wand and high-precision brush can grab lashes close to the roots to perfectly fan them out, corner to corner.

product_name: HYPNOSE
description:
Let your eyelashes take center stage with Lancôme’s full volume mascara, Hypnôse Drama. Volume in a single step.
 Our curvaceous super-sized brush for full lash contact creates high volume and thicker looking lashes. With every stroke our glossy mascara builds a stunning gaze, for beautiful, full body lashes.

product_name: HYPNOSE
description:
Hypnôse Drama Waterproof combines the high impact volume of Hypnôse Drama with the benefit of being waterproof.
 
 You won’t believe your eyes: the generous Convex brush gives full lash contact for a full impact volume look. A waterproof formula with up to 24 hour hold and a irresistibly volumised look.

product_name: HYPNOSE
description:
Our Iconic Hypnôse mascara offering volume control in a new luxurious packaging.
 Go as bold, or natural as you desire with every stroke. The SoftSculpt ™ formula is enriched in ProVitamin B5 and leaves lashes feeling soft and supple.
 Create day to evening looks with this buildable mascara, and achieve up to 8 times the volume.

product_name: HYPNOSE
description:

product_name: HYPNOSE
description:
Watch lashes turn into a doll-eyed look with Lancôme’s Hypnôse Doll Eyes.
 
 A must-have mascara to create beautiful lashes that look extended and lifted, Hypnôse Doll Eyes evenly coats lashes without weighing them down. 
 
 Sweep on using our cone shaped brush and watch your eyes transform into a dazzling wide-eyed look.

product_name: HYPNOSE
description: Discover seductive volume, striking length and intense black colour which lasts all night long. The high precision elastomer brush gently glides on just the right amount of mascara and softly lengthens lashes. The shorter bristles coat the lashes from the roots, while the longest ones stretch the formula to the tips.

description: An eyeliner with a patent shine that won't smudge or smear. It is smudge proof and virtually waterproof. It has unique patent leather finish for incredible shine and added drama.

product_name: FALSE LASH TELESCOPIC
description: Get a lengthening false lash effect with False Lash Telescopic. The innovative lengthening fibre formula builds intensity. Lashes look elongated as if beyond their tips. The Telescopic brush stretches every lash for an intense look.

product_name: VOLUME MILLION LASHES BLACK
description: Boasts a Millionizer brush that separates lashes for a fanned-out lash effect. With a superb elastic elastomer applicator comprising long and short bristles. Helps coat each lash evenly from root to tip. Features an in-built excess wiper that removes excess mascara for no clumps. Delivers just the appropriate amount of formula. Creates a lush, volumized lash look.

product_name: VOLUME MILLION LASHES EXTRA BLACK
description: Want a mascara that gives lashings of volume without the clumps? Don't just volumize, millionize your lashes. Volume Million Lashes has a multitude of bristles to separate lashes for a fanned-out effect. The Excess Wiper is an in-built wiper system that removes excess mascara, wiping brush free of clumps.

product_name: VOLUME MILLION LASHES EXCESS BLACK
description: A powerful mascara for luxurious lashes. Builds extra volume whilst separating each single lash for perfect definition. Features anti-clump wiper that removes excess mascara from the brush. Gives thick yet sophisticated lashes. Leaves your eyes looking chic and seductive.

product_name: FALSE LASH SUPERSTAR BLACK
description: An innovative 2-step mascara for superstar lashes. Step 1: Super-sizing primer helps thicken lashes. The corset shaped brush builds volume and prepares for step 2. Step 2: Super-lengthening top coat is enriched with Velcro fibers. Helps perfectly coat the primer with a lifting brush. Creates super-sized, super-long and red-carpet lashes dressed in intense black.

product_name: FALSE LASH ARCHITECT 4D BLACK
MEGA VOLUME COLLAGENE EXTRA BLACK
description: L'Oreal Paris Mega Volume Collagene Mascara has a new booster breakthrough formula enriched with collagene biospheres and black booster pigments to achieve breathtaking individual lash by lash volume that creates 15 times more impact for the ultimate volume look. The brush is also twice the size to coat lashes generously without clumping. This listing is for three mascaraes.

product_name: DOUBLE EXTENSION CARBON BLACK
DOUBLE EXTENSION BEAUTY TUBES BLACK
description: L' Oréal Double Extension Beauty Tube is a two-step mascara. It is composed of a conditioning white base coat enriched with Ceramide R (which contains naturally derived fibres). The base coat acts like extensions to visibly lengthen the appearance of your lashes and an intense colour wraps around your lashes in tubes for a lash extension effect and no smudging.

description: Reduce the appearance of your pores with our Pore Filler. The perfect pre-foundation basecoat, this talc-free, oil-free formulation includes Vitamin E to smooth and enhance your skin.

description: Prepare your canvas with our silky primer. The studio perfect primer formula is easily absorbed, creates a smooth surface for foundation, and ensures the longevity of your makeup. Available in 3 shades: clear (to cover fine lines and large pores); lavender (to brighten and illuminate yellow undertones); and green (to eliminate redness).

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Honey Dew Me Up Primer Fac
description: Inspired by honey's golden glow, we developed a primer that neutralizes the appearance of discoloration and redness. Our innovative light reflective gold flecks create a luminous look that will help keep your skin looking radiant all day.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Hydra Touch Primer Face Ma
description: Enhance your complexion with our Hydra Touch Primer! This versatile formula creates a smooth, glowing canvas for flawless coverage while its skin-loving ingredients smooth and refresh the complexion.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Hydra Touch Oil Primer
description: Treat your complexion to the ultimate fresh touch with our new Hydra Touch Oil Primer. Infused with skin-loving ingredients like jojoba and safflower oil, this ultra-lightweight formula features a luxurious texture and glides on like a dream for a finish that feels and looks amazing. A smooth-looking, dewy canvas and beautiful foundation coverage is just drops away!

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Can’t Stop Won’t Stop Matt
description: Can't Stop Won't Stop Matte Primer will always go to the matte for you. This new, comfortable formula preps your complexion for super-smooth foundation application and a matte finish. Just spread the creamy primer evenly over the skin and gently tap to set it. Then complete your shine-less look with its bestie: Can't Stop Won't Stop Full Coverage Foundation.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Worth The Hype Volumizing
description: Take our word for it: if you want your lashes to look darker, fuller and lethally gorgeous all day long, then our new Worth the Hype Volumizing & Lengthening Mascara is your jam. A breeze to apply and comfortable to wear, this buildable formula actually does what it promises, making it "worth the hype" in every which way. It also features a brush that tapers at the tip, so you can brush, build, and lengthen even the littlest baby lashes at the inner corners of your eyes.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP On The Rise Volume Liftsca
description: Elevate your expectations with our new ON the Rise volume liftscara. This ultra-pigmented formula catches and coats lashes in matte Black color for quick-charge lift and volume in just a few strokes. Featuring an innovative applicator shape and an elastomer brush head, The part-hourglass, part-rounded brush delivers high drama, intense volume and serious elevation! Case in point: in a clinical study, 95% of participants saw instant volume and 94% saw instant lift.

product_name: NYX Professional Makeup Make Up Setting Spray Dewy
description: Demand Perfection. For that fresh make up look that lasts, NYX Makeup Setting Sprays are lightweight and comfortable while working hard to make sure your makeup stays put. Available in a gorgeous Matte Shine-Free Finish or Dewy Fresh Glow.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Makeup Setting Spray, Matt
description: Demand Perfection. For that fresh make up look that lasts, NYX Makeup Setting Sprays are lightweight and comfortable while working hard to make sure your makeup stays put. Available in a gorgeous Matte Shine-Free Finish or Dewy Fresh Glow. Shake the bottle and spray onto your face from a 6 inch distance. The spray will then set your makeup resisting unwanted color fade.

product_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Ultimate Shadow Palette
description: Good news, shadow lovers! We've added two new palettes to the Ultimate Shadow Palette family, and they're as dope as ever. Brimming with smokey tones of true navy and gray, the Ash palette is all about capturing that cool, smoldering drama, while our Phoenix palette comes loaded with bright-haute shades of red and berry-perfect for creating intense, sizzling looks.

product_name: Fiji Bottled Natural Mineral Water - 500ml (Pack of 24)
description: On a remote Pacific island, 1,600 miles from the nearest continent, equatorial trade winds purify the clouds that begin FIJI Water s journey through one of the world s last virgin ecosystems. As tropical rain falls on a pristine rain forest, it filters through layers of volcanic rock, slowly gathering the natural minerals that give FIJI Water its soft, smooth taste. The water collects in a natural artesian aquifer, deep below the Earth s surface, shielded from external elements by confining layers of rock. Natural pressure forces the water towards the surface, where it s bottled at the source, free from human contact until you unscrew the cap. FIJI Water, natural mineral water bottled at the source in Viti Levu (Fiji islands), is the No. 1 imported bottled water in the United States. FIJI Water, known for its iconic square bottle, soft mouth feel and unique mineral profile, is the water of choice among discerning consumers and top chefs. Widely available in leading hotels, fine restaurants, retail locations, as well as by direct delivery, FIJI Water has expanded globally to more than 60 countries.
